# Ignore files and directories generated by Visual Studio
.vscode/
.vs/
bin/
obj/

# Ignore user-specific Visual Studio settings
*.suo
*.user
*.userprefs
*.sln.docstates

# Ignore NuGet packages
packages/

# Ignore build output
[Dd]ebug/
[Rr]elease/
x64/
[Aa][Rr][Mm]/
[Aa][Rr][Mm]64/
bld/
[Bb][Ii][Nn]/
[Ll][Oo][Gg][Ss]/

# Visual Studio code files
.vscode/

# Rider
.idea/

# User-specific files
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# User-specific Visual Studio 2019 directory
.vs2019/
